item.description:
League of NH Craftsmen is one of the best fine craft fairs in the country.  It always amazes me our little state sustains this volume of artisans who have truly mastered their crafts.  Whether you're into craft or art, textiles, jewelry, pottery, glass, home decor, workshops, I would urge absolutely anyone to check it out. 

 

If you'd like to carpool, you can contact the other members through meetup/comments.  Unfortunately I'll be coming from another direction so cannot drive on this one.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the wearable art exhibit.
item.name: League of NH Craftsmen
